translations: n.真菌；菌类植物（fungus 的复数）

sentences.sentence: At home and abroad the importance of medicinal funguses (including fungus medicines) has been paid great attention to increasingly.
sentences.translation: 药用真菌(含真菌药物)的重要性在国内外均已日益受到重视。

sentences.sentence: The invention relates to a resting preservation method of a liquid strain in an edible fungus, which belongs to the technical field of application of liquid strains in edible funguses.
sentences.translation: 本发明属于食用菌液体菌种应用技术领域，具体涉及一种食用菌液体菌种静息化保存方法。
